attributes.action: Abolish the tv licensing fee from the bbc
attributes.additional_details:
The time for a monopoly on tv channels has well come to pass, they can use adverts like everyone else to gain an income for the corporation, the tv license is outdated and un needed, to be charged simply for having an aerial on your roof is despicable, i personally do not view bbc programming at all because i use streaming services such as netflix or amazon video as do thousands.
I propose an abolishment on rhe BBC's tv licensing and monopoly over the airwaves.
It should not have been allowed.
attributes.background:
The BBC first started the tv license on  the 1/06/1946 , as it is 2020 and they still run this scheme when all other broadcasters use adverts it seems an unfair advantage for them to: • charge for a licence to watch their shows
• reserve more bandwidth than they truly need

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555918
